name: Western Roshambo
description:
How to play: ActionKey to pressSTART the gameLEFT MOUSE  BUTTON or SPACE or ENTERSwitch to NEXT ELEMENTLEFT MOUSE  BUTTON or SPACE or ENTERSwitch to ROCKQSwitch to PAPER
WSwitch to SCISSORSE

Try to optimize  your HIGH SCORE by switching between  the right  ROCK-PAPER-SCISSORS-Elements. 

Right  element5 PointsEqual elment2 PointsWrong elementyou loose

The game will try to stop  you with SABOTAGES so that getting 1.000 Points is a tough challenge.
